data.description: Thread a collection of Email::Simple objects
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Much like Mail::Thread except it handles Email::Simple objects (and
    polymorphic classes of E::S). Implementation is as a subclass of
    Mail::Thread so there not even any code duplication.

    Email::Thread is part of the Email project to simplify the mail
    handling landscape.
